features: Your New Best Friend for Lower Back: Say no to Sciatica! Our ergonomic seat cushion is the answer to all your back-pain woes while driving and in the office. Don't let back-pain ruin your day!

Enhanced Dual-Layer Gel & Memory Foam: EcoNour’s Tailbone Cushion features a dual-layer gel & memory foam, unlike others. With this, your spinal cord and tailbone will have a soothing, pressure-free experience!
Breathable & Removable Mesh Layer: The removable top mesh layer is breathable and can be machine-washed. This prevents the coccyx cushion from getting dirty and stays fresh all-day!
Designed for Orthopedic Wellness: EcoNour's Tailbone Pain Relief Cushion is proven effective for orthopedic ailments such as sciatica, coccyx pain, lower back pain, neck and spinal cord pains.
Easy to Carry: Thanks to the tough handle, you can carry the sciatica pillow for sitting in your office as an office chair pad, doing yoga, driving, resting outdoors, and much more!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Say goodbye to sciatica! Upgrade Your Work Comfort! Introducing EcoNour Office Seat Cushion – Your Solution to All-Day Comfort and Productivity. Say goodbye to discomfort and hello to ergonomic support. Boost your posture and focus with our premium cushion. Elevate your workspace experience by improving your posture!

Previous page Your Comfy Throne! Sit with luxury and comfort, thanks to the perforated mesh and the heat-dissipating cooling gel! Intense Pressure Relief! Our memory foam is hypoallergenic and helps evenly distribute body weight to relieve pain. Remove and clean in a jiffy! The zipper linings provide easy access for removing the mesh and making it easy to clean. Portable. Compact. Lightweight. The strengthened handle makes it simple to carry and store, providing added convenience. Next page 1 Cooling Gel Layer 2 High-Density Memory Foam 3 Removable Zipper 4 Carrying Handle

The Seat Cushion made by EcoNour offers great support for your spine, providing many benefits such as: Incredible Spine and Tailbone supportHelps prevent and alleviate sciaticaProtects coccyx pressureImproves posturePromotes blood circulationBenefits digestive healthDecreases hip pressure

Does EcoNour Seat Cushion have memory foam? Yes, EcoNour Seat Cushion does have an hypoallergenic memory foam Is the Memory Foam hypoallergenic? EcoNour uses a hypoallergenic memory foam that contours to your shape Can EcoNour Seat Cushion be used in a car? Yes, EcoNour Seat Cushion can be used anywhere and on any surface, thanks to the dotted-grip rubber bottom

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Takes pressure off the back and has great support
reviews.reviewText: This was a gift. It holds up well and takes pressure off the back after long periods of sitting. It gives slightly enough to accommodate my weight, but not to the point of lacking support. I like the gel cushion. It doesn't get hot after a while. It stays cool. It holds up all day. I also like the carrying handle. I can take it with me to the car for long car rides. The grip part on the bottom hold the cushi6in place so it doesn't slide around. This was a great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for the price point. Just buy it!
reviews.reviewText: I sit for long periods of time for work. I have developed pain in my coccyx, and this cushion has enough padding to relieve my pressure points. For the price point it is a good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Feels like memory foam..
reviews.reviewText: Feels comfy soft .. very memory foam feel .. not sure where the gel part comes in.Personally I prefer firmer.. but this is being used for my elderly parents mobility scooters seats for sciatic pain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product as I have a long trip coming up and I need support on that long drive that I'm about to make. I was looking through Amazon to find one that was for a good price but also that had good reviews with a product that would deliver the support needed, and I came across this one and I like the reviews that it had which made me make the decision to buy it. I just received it today I was excited to open it but as soon as I opened it upon unzipping it from its case so that I can see the cushion it took me by surprise seeing that it looked as if it had already been used or if it had been damaged by something I don't know what to make of it but from what I've seen on the pictures of this product and on some pictures of reviews theirs don't look like that so I just don't know what to make of it. It's really disconcerting and makes me question if I received a used one when I paid for a new one or if it got damaged somewhere in the warehouse it just looks very questionable I don't know what to make it which is why I'm giving it three stars, there's also what look like tiny hairs like from a clipper which makes me think that if I did receive a used one somebody that was like a barber might have had it I don't know. I'm hoping to get an answer about it and then I will change my rating. Other than that it feels very plush I like the thickness of it, the cooling gel I like very much it feels very cool to the touch very comfortable as well to the touch which I'm guessing once sat upon will be very comfortable and supportive the only bad thing is just that used look that it has as you can see in the pictures. I'm hoping I can get a explanation because I was really excited and really wanted this one as it seemed like it was going to be the one to give that cooling support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what we needed
reviews.reviewText: These seat cushions are pretty darn good. They do relieve pressure near the tailbone. I might order another set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use it all lthe time.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and I like the feature it has for automatic turn off. You can use it in different positions too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: iv'e had a similar cushion for years and recommend it for a bad back..my ladyfriend has a bad back as well and stated she wanted to try one.bought her this one for x-mas and myself one for a replacement..just got back from a 1400 mile( drove myrtle beach to venice fla) round trip and it really helped.seems good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The foam collapsed after 2min sitting providing no support while sitting. I bought the two pack with lots of positive expectations. Even sitting on both, after a few minutes flatten out. With that said it is very obvious the foam density is wrong. Don't waste your money...

I've had spinal issues since '95, and I've been using seat cushions for years. Each cushion has been a disappointment to some degree. Not this one. The seat cushion that is made by EcoNour has to be the most comfortable I've ever had. The non-skid backing (the side closest to my office chair) is fantastic, and stays put. You don't ever have to adjust it one inch this way or that. This is what all seat cushions should be. Thank you, Amazon, for making my life just a bit more comfortable. It came before I expected it, so I'm enjoying just a bit more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Comfortable, helps with sitting for longer.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as I have a protruding disc which is causing back and leg pain.Using this cushion means I can sit for longer on a dining chair than I would be able to otherwise, even though that's still not for long.I like the gel layer it does stop overheating and will be great for the summer.I would recommend this and I will be using it when I go back to work.

I recently injured my tailbone and found it hard to sit without being in pain. I read that a special seat like this one would help and since it arrived and was ready to sit on I feel so much better. The price was reasonable and I don’t have to worry about always lying down now that I have this seat. Plus it has memory foam….love it ❤️

reviews.reviewTitle: Works well in an arm chair.
reviews.reviewText: This cushion was purchased for an elderly man with pain issues in his legs which prevented him from sitting for long spells on chairs with no support. He uses the cushion every day. He says it works better on an arm chair than on the work chair behind his desk. He is able to sit for several hours in the armchair without getting up.
